<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Directional Bombs](/Feats.aspx?ID=104) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=7" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 78 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Demolitionist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=118) (Level 8)

</column>

---

You can lob bombs with great force and a precise trajectory to angle the splash in a cone spraying in a single direction. When throwing an alchemical bomb with the [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) trait, instead of splashing all squares adjacent to the target, you can treat the target’s space as the first affected square of a 15-foot cone directed away from you, potentially allowing you to avoid allies and splash deeper into enemy lines. If the target takes up more than a single square, the target’s square closest to you is the first affected square of the cone.

<title level="2">Directional Bombs leads to...</title>
[Controlled Blast](/Feats.aspx?ID=3243)
